articles.author: Mehul Reuben Das, Mehul Reuben Das
articles.title: Earth DOESN'T revolve around the Sun? NASA explains new insights into planet's motion - Firstpost
articles.description: Although the Sun is the dominant force in our Solar System, new insights into planetary motion reveal that Earth doesn’t actually orbit the Sun in the straightforward way we once thought
articles.content: Up until now, most of us have believed that the Earth, like most other planets, revolves around the Sun. However, it seems that our understanding of how planets move about in the fabric of space and … [+2759 chars]
